Search for grants in the area of systematics

Search for grants in the area of systematics

SearchForPhylo(data, terms = c("systematics", "phylogen", "taxonom",
  "tree of life"))

Arguments

data

Data.frame from GetAllDataFromMultipleYears
terms

Vector of terms to look for

Value

A data.frame with matches.
